```{python3}
#| echo: true

library(ggplot2)
dat <- data.frame(cond = rep(c("A", "B"), each=10), xvar = 1:20 + rnorm(20,sd=3), yvar = 1:20 + rnorm(20,sd=3))

ggplot(dat, aes(x=xvar, y=yvar)) +
  geom_point(shape=1) + 
  geom_smooth() 
```
